p: In DBR, the annual average temperature and the precipitation increased during the observation period (1955–1985) ( Fig 1A and 1B), while in BCI, they showed different trends over time. In BCI, the annual average temperature increased while the annual average precipitation decreased from 1981 to 2005 ( Fig 1C and 1D). The rate of increasing temperature in BCI was greater than that in DBR. When we compared the trend of annual average temperature at the two sites across a similar period (1981–2005), we found that the annual average temperature of both DBR and BCI showed a similar upward trend.
